name: NEBULEX
description:
Nebulex is a space-themed MMO Shooter.

We wanted to launch something new, something that hadn't been done before. Battle between two carriers using vehicles, turrets and sabotage to take down your enemy.  Play 5 Gamemodes (Destruction, Team Deathmatch, Capture the Flag, Astroball and Meltdown). Nebulex is in beta right now, so we're still working on some features, join our Discord and let us know what you think!
